resources.string: Whether you’re a high level researcher or a member of the general public, neurosense can show you new ways of understanding the brain.
You can access the following explanation again through the \"About App\" button in the menu
Now you can see the receptive fields generated from images and audio clips that match the ones made by neurons in your brain!
Whether you’re a high level researcher or a member of the general public, neurosense can show you new ways of understanding the brain.
You can access the following explanation again through the \"About App\" button in the menu
